data.message: Hahahahaha hey man please do explain, why 8?  is for 8 mile right? do you know is my personal mark. I was born labelled with three 8 at my born paper i do not know the right name, and the time i begun to fall and fall and fall i read that and after i knew my grand mother died April 8, my grand father died September 8 and an aunt in law died January 8, so i was scared and thought i was born labelled to die. More than 13 years i was with those heavy chains i felt i was going to die, then i found you, sent you a message and i could say forgive me to a so very, very important singer now dead and i felt better since i could tell my story to your team and so  this singer opened his door to me to tell him that. Then into my mind i am in debt with you a debt of LIFE,  you saved my life indeed, trust me, so as i have said i want to pay my bills, i hate debts and debts of honor you just have to pay. So "here i am can you send me an angel, here i am, in the Land of the morning star" Scorpions don't you know Jesus is the MORNING STAR and the DEVIL is THE SONG OF THE MORNING STAR? music has to make its changes... its kingdom belongs that poor lonely man called Jesus not to the devil... so many things have to change man... Mmmmm Em dear, could you please surprise me and TRY, just TRY to waste your time, brain, effort, force, etc., etc., etc., to make a SONG to Donald, Donald J. Trump and his wisdom? please darling friend of mine, that man is going to get closer to the pope to rule the whole world as the Pope will until the end of time, trust me, well we have time to see it... just let it happen, now please try hahahahahaha sorry is really such a waste of time and all things above said and even MORE. Greetings dear white Rabbit i will show you mine i  have in jail maybe is YOU... LoL, just kidding this is a lady Rabbit perhaps is me. See you soon God bless you white rapper. Love in Jesus the King of Kings and Lord of Lords.
